title.rendered: Roomi vs SpareRoom: Choosing the Best Roommate Finder

content.rendered:
The move to a new city is a challenging time, especially if you have to find an apartment and a roommate to live with. Choosing a place to live or a person to share your space with is a big decision and it can be hard to get it right. If you’re moving to a new city and need a roommate finder, read on to see which one is right for you.

Pricing: Are roommate finder apps free or paid?

Spareroom lets you get started for free, but you have to pay up for important features like ‘Early Bird Access’ to contact Free Ads less than 7 days old. To become an upgraded user on Spareroom, you will need to pay accordingly:

  • 7 days: $10.99
  • 14 days: $19.99
  • 28 days: $24.99
  • 6 months: $99
  • 1 year: $139

You can easily sign up for free to Roomi and start your roommate search or browse listings. Being a roommate finder, you can easily browse through verified profiles that go through a background check for your safety.

Also, Roomi’s paid plan gives you access to features. Features like background checks, identity verifications, messaging plans, listing credits, profile boosts, and listing boosts. The weekly membership of Roomi Gold is $29.99 billed monthly or $14.99 billed monthly.

Security: Can these apps help me find roommates I can trust?

Making sure that you have a legitimate, safe roomie is important. And, if you want a roommate finder that can help you make sure of this, Roomi has you covered! It can be intimidating to move to a new city without any friends or family, which makes having a safe roomie even more important. As a Spareroom alternative, Roomi has safety features like background checks to make sure you have a safe roomie that you can trust.

That feeling when you can trust a roommate finder to give you verified users

  • Verifies Roommate Contact Info

Roomi uses GlobaliD, a digital identity platform to verify users and their contact information. While signing up for Roomi, you need to verify your email ID. This makes it a great choice when it comes to safety.

  • ID Verification

With profiles being vetted, you can be sure that Roomi is a safe Spareroom alternative that ensures your safety and privacy. User profiles go through ID verification and this information stays private and secure. Also, if you upgrade to premium, Roomi can show you users who have passed the background check.

  • Privacy & security of profiles

Complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you can stay assured that your data is treated with care as you go about your roommate search on Roomi. As a Spareroom alternative, Roomi takes privacy seriously with secure messaging built into the app. On apps like Spareroom or Roomi, this is an important feature, as you don’t need to share your personal contact information to communicate. On the Roomi roommate finder, you can choose what data is shared on your profile. You can also completely delete your profile if you wish to.

  • 24/7 Support & Content Moderation

With an in-house content moderation team, Roomi goes beyond apps like Spareroom and others to make sure what you see is real. With both listings and people being verified, Roomi makes your apartment or roommate search a lot more reliable. The content moderation team also fights spam and fake listing and profiles to make it safe for everyone!

Spareroom on the other hand says that they do not check every advertiser on the site but take user safety seriously.

  • Criminal Background Check

While a criminal background check is not essential on apps like Spareroom or Roomi, Roomi does carry out these checks upon request. If requested, Roomi can verify profiles against criminal databases to ensure a safe experience.

User Profiles: Which App Makes It Easier to Find Your Perfect Roommate?

  • With an easy-to-navigate website and interface, Roomi is a roommate finder that anyone can use without any hassle. The additional options like search and filters make Roomi a great Spareroom alternative that makes your roommate search much easier.
  • Apps like Spareroom and Roomi both have filters to help you narrow down your search. However, on Roomi you have more choices. Using Roomi for your roommate search, you can filter by personal preferences like gender, house rules, amenities, people with an empty room, and more. This makes it easier to find the kind of room or roommate this right for you.

Is it safe to find housing on Craigslist?

Try a room/roommate finder like Roomi instead.

Craigslist doesn’t have the safety or verification features that are available on Roomi. Craigslist has also had many incidents of scams or frauds taking place on its platform. Try using a dedicated room-finding app like Roomi instead!

Find Roommates

So, which Is the best Roommate finder for you?

If you’re moving to a new city and want to choose from roommate finder apps like Spareroom or Roomi, be sure to keep the things mentioned here in mind. Choosing a room or roommate finder app is just as important as choosing the right roommate. Be sure that the app that you’re choosing for your roommate search has safety and privacy features to make the experience easy and safe. Roomi is your one-stop option to list or find rooms, find roommates to settle into a new city easily. Download the app and sign up today!

Roomi is your one-stop option to list or find rooms, find roommates to settle into a new city easily. Download the app and sign up today!

DOWNLOAD THE APP NOW!
